name: cumulocity-smart-map-settings-widget-plugin
description: The Smart Map Setting widget help user to setup geography, indoor floor plan, svg images, GeoJSOn, Geofences for single/multiple floors. This will be used by Smart Map
author: Darpankumar Lalani - Software AG, Global Presales

application.name: Cumulocity Smart Map Settings Widget Plugin
application.description: The is Smart Map Configuration widget
application.globalTitle: The is Smart Map Configuration widget
application.contentSecurityPolicy: base-uri 'none'; default-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' http: https: ws: wss: blob:; connect-src 'self' *.aptrinsic.com *.billwerk.com http: https: ws: wss: blob:;  script-src 'self' open.mapquestapi.com *.twitter.com *.twimg.com *.aptrinsic.com 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' data:; style-src * 'unsafe-inline' blob:; img-src * data: blob:; font-src * data:; frame-src *; worker-src 'self' blob:;

exports.name: Smart Map Settings widget plugin
exports.description: The Smart Map Setting widget help user to setup geography, indoor floor plan, svg images, GeoJSOn, Geofences for single/multiple floors. This will be used by Smart Map.
